name: Self Esteam
description:
*Profanity warning in-game!*

This is a prototype play through of the tutorial of what could be a much larger game, if there is interest! I made this in a short amount of time during my Master's course in Creative Media - so I'm really keen on your thoughts and feedback :) 

Please leave a comment below, or fill in the Google form if you have the time.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdost-UIV-XNVRzGBsSmKKkkDE-CnaFMGQxJZTv...
